original_text: It is as if he caused me to eat small stones, so that the stones broke my teeth.
korean_text: 조약돌로 내 이들을 꺾으시고 재로 나를 덮으셨도다

sentences.original_text: It is as if he caused me to eat small stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 내게 작은 돌들을 먹게 한 것 같다

sentences.original_text: so that the stones broke my teeth
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 돌들이 내 이를 부셨다
